summary.body: Could anyone recommend a good, local cleaner for a neurotic? My last one shipped herself back to Poland, first class. D07
summary.subject: Cleaner Recommendation

summary.body: I fear our list of tropical pests may be extending beyond mosquitos. Walking on the podium this morning, just where the Postern meets the ramp to JP Morgan/Pizza Express, I noticed a rather large (2 inches), brown, fat, hairy and frankly horrendous spider. If someone braver than me spots it again, perhaps they could entice it into a jar and take it off for identificaton? Or failing that, stamp on it?
summary.subject: Spider alert

summary.body: I hate to be a moaning minnie, but the sound of the lady above me marching up and down and up and down her flat is driving me mad! Whats the etiquette here? She must have a wooded/hard floor. I guess I might just need to knock on her door and have a quiet word, but by the sound of her footsteps, she sounds bigger than me!
summary.subject: Footsteps driving me crazy!

summary.body: how many gays live on the estate?
summary.subject: only straight on the estate

summary.body: WHO RUNS THE CITY? ANYBODY GOT INFO ABOUT CITY POLITICAL HISTORY?
summary.subject: POLITICS
